title: Winter Olympics 2026: "Go get them, boys" - Sidney Crosby rallies Team Canada to victory after exiting quarter-final with injury
desc: The two-time Olympic champion took two hits in the quarter-final against Czechia early in the second period and was later ruled out of the game.

title: Mexico confirm friendlies vs Australia, Ghana and Serbia ahead of 2026 World Cup
desc: Mexico have announced three additional friendlies against Australia, Ghana and Serbia as part of their final preparations for the 2026 World Cup. El Tri will open the tournament on June 11 against South Africa at the Estadio Azteca. The matches are designed to limit travel and fine-tune the squad before the global showcase on home soil.

title: Winter Olympics: Canada escape shock exit at hands of Czechs in men’s ice hockey
desc: Nick Suzuki tied the game on a deflection with 3:27 left, Mitch Marner scored in overtime and Canada avoided what would have been a stunning quarter-final exit

title: Mikaela Shiffrin slays Olympic dragon, wins slalom gold for first medal since 2018
desc: Shiffrin's Olympic nightmare is over. After a sparkling first run, Shiffrin sealed the deal in the second run Wednesday to win the slalom.

title: Chrissy Teigen shares which kid might follow in dad John Legend's footsteps

title: The premium for my private health insurance is going up. How do I figure out if it’s worth it?

title: Hugh Hefner’s widow alleges his foundation kept thousands of sexual photos
desc: Crystal Hefner was removed as the chief executive officer of the Hugh M. Hefner Foundation after she voiced concerns over publishing the private images, according to her lawyer.

title: Consumer watchdog concerned by rise of per-item prices at Australian supermarkets
desc: Gina Cass-Gottlieb says one of the regulator’s main priorities is to ensure price claims are ‘clear and truthful’

title: ICE Teams Up With Microsoft as Surveillance Powers Quietly Expand
desc: ICE's Microsoft partnership creates expansive surveillance infrastructure using Azure cloud tools that could easily target any population beyond immigration enforcement.

title: US has 'many arguments' to strike Iran, White House says
desc: White House spokeswoman Karoline Leavitt stated that Tehran would be wise to reach an agreement to avoid any conflict.
